name: Cook the Book: Raw Scallops with Green Apple and Dashi
description: Green apples, raw scallops, poppy seeds, and dashi might seem like unlikely partners but when the elements come together the flavors make prefect sense. The sweet scallops play off of the dashi's umami and the apples lend a bit of tart sweetness and crunch.
recipeIngredient: 4 diver or bay scallops, thinly sliced
1 green apple, sliced horizontally, and into small thin wedges
1 bunch scallions, sliced into 1-inch lengths and sliced vertically as thinly as possible (then placed in ice water)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the sliced scallops in the center of the bowl.
Sprinkle the poppy seeds and sea salt on top of the scallops.
Pour the dashi into the bowl to cover half way.
Garnish with the apple, scallions, sea salt, and serve.
